movement

类 RandomDirection

  • java.lang.Object
    • movement.MovementModel
      • movement.RandomDirection
  • 直接已知子类:
    ModifiedRandomDirection

    public class RandomDirection
extends MovementModel

    Random Direction movement model as described in: Elizabeth M. Royer, P. Michael Melliar-Smith, and Louise E. Moser, "An Analysis of the Optimum Node Density for Ad hoc Mobile Networks"

    Nodes will start at a random place on the simulation area and pick a random direction and follow it to the edge of the simulation area. They will then pause and pick another direction to go in until they hit the edge again.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getPath

        public Path getPath()
        从类复制的说明: MovementModel
        Returns a new path by this movement model or null if no new path could be constructed at the moment (node should wait where it is). A new path should not be requested before the destination of the previous path has been reached.
        指定者:
        getPath 在类中 MovementModel
        返回:
        A new path or null

      • getInitialLocation

        public Coord getInitialLocation()
        从类复制的说明: MovementModel
        Returns a new initial placement for a node
        指定者:
        getInitialLocation 在类中 MovementModel
        返回:
        The initial coordinates for a node

      • replicate

        public MovementModel replicate()
        从类复制的说明: MovementModel
        Creates a replicate of the movement model.
        指定者:
        replicate 在类中 MovementModel
        返回:
        A new movement model with the same settings as this model

      • getTravelFraction

        protected double getTravelFraction()
        Returns the fraction of the path to follow towards the edge. This is called after the direction of travel has been picked and the path towards the edge calculated. Returning 1.0 causes the node to travel all the way to the edge, returning 0.5 would cause the node to travel half way, etc.
        返回:
        the fraction of the path to follow towards the edge of the simulation area
